SEARCH
Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.plugin.security

Interface SignatureKeyProviderPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InitializablePlugin, InternalPlugin, IStartablePlugin, Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
SignatureKeyProviderPlatformPlugin, SignatureKeyProviderPluginBase
public interface SignatureKeyProviderPlugin extends IStartablePlugin, InitializablePlugin
Plugin for retrieving a cryptographic key for digital signatures. Keys can optionally be resolved using qualifiers like security realm, user id, requester domain, etc.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface gw.plugin.InitializablePlugin

    ROOT_DIR, TEMP_DIR

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PrivateKey
    getPrivateKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
    Returns the private key used to create digital signature for asymmetric algorithms such as RSA or ECDSA.
    PublicKey
    getPublicKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
    Returns the public key used to verify digital signatures for asymmetric algorithms such as RSA or ECDSA.
    SecretKey
    getSecretKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
    Returns a symmetric key used creating or verifying digital signatures for algorithms such as HMAC.

    Methods inherited from interface gw.plugin.InitializablePlugin

    setParameters

    Methods inherited from interface gw.api.startable.IStartablePlugin

    getState, start, stop

  • Method Details

    • getSecretKey

      SecretKey getSecretKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, @Nullable Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
      Returns a symmetric key used creating or verifying digital signatures for algorithms such as HMAC.
      Parameters:
      signatureAlgorithm - The cryptographic algorithm
      qualifiers - The optional qualifiers used to resolve the appropriate key
      Returns:
      The secret key

    • getPublicKey

      PublicKey getPublicKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, @Nullable Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
      Returns the public key used to verify digital signatures for asymmetric algorithms such as RSA or ECDSA.
      Parameters:
      signatureAlgorithm - The cryptographic algorithm
      qualifiers - The optional qualifiers used to resolve the appropriate key
      Returns:
      The public key

    • getPrivateKey

      PrivateKey getPrivateKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, @Nullable Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
      Returns the private key used to create digital signature for asymmetric algorithms such as RSA or ECDSA.
      Parameters:
      signatureAlgorithm - The cryptographic algorithm
      qualifiers - The optional qualifiers used to resolve the appropriate key
      Returns:
      The private key
